page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICOLA
page.content: In the morning I wake up at about 6.45am.I read a book until 7.15am and then I go to the front door and get the newspaper.I read the paper to see what is going on in the world around me.I get out of bed at 7.45am and get dressed.I then go and get my breakfast and afterwards I get washed,brush my teeth and brush my hair.Then I get my bag and put on my coat.We, my mum,and sisters and I get in the car and go to school.A couple of minutes after we arrive the whistle goes.We go in and after Mrs.Pepper, our form teacher has called the registar, we do our Daily Ten.Then we have assembly and do some other work.We have break at 10.30am and we play boarding schools.After school I go horse riding for half an hour. When I return home in the evening I play with my sisters, have my tea,watch TV and go to bed at 9.00.
